ISSUE.TITLE: LDAP authentication
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Many companies use Active Directory to manage access to different resources. Usually AD server has LDAP protocol support to work with tools like Jira/TeamCity/BitBucket/etc.. It would be great to support authentication in Drone through LDAP.
